name: Golgo 13: Secret Ties (prototype)
description:
Secret Ties is an Action game, developed by Graphic Research and published by Vic Tokai, which was cancelled before it was released.
This game was fairly enjoyable despite the cheesy speech lines given by the main character who seems awfully familiar to Mr. Togo from Golgo 13.
Then again, the company which produced Golgo 13 also produced this anime series as well which would explain why the characters look so similar.
Still, this was a worth while game to play just for the experience itself and the music being above average.
